member.name: IDxcBlobUtf8.GetStringLength
member.summary: Retrieves the length of the string stored in this blob, in characters, excluding the null-terminator.

member.name: IDxcBlobUtf8.GetStringPointer
member.summary: Retrieves a pointer to the string stored in this blob.

member.name: IDxcBlobUtf8
member.summary: A blob containing a null-terminated string, and using the UTF-8 character encoding. Depending on the -encoding option passed to the compiler, this interface is used to return string output blobs (such as errors/warnings, preprocessed HLSL, or other text). The methods of IDxcBlobUtf8 guarantee null-terminated text, and UTF-8 character encoding. is used to return output name strings in DXC.
